name: wildcads - nested template block styled

the line start/end wildcards %ls & %le in the following syntax's token let the whole opening & closing lines disappear in the result

name: comments
template:
<!-- This is a command and should be removed. -->
<!-- I'm a command either, but i'm replaced by some text! Mention: this marker cantains line detection. So the line break will be lost. -->
next line!
<!-- So each marker can also work like command brackets. -->
<!-- I -->
